autonumeric_abbr_billions._description: The suffix to show after an abbreviated value in the billions (e.g. $1.2b)

autonumeric_abbr_millions._description: The suffix to show after an abbreviated value in the millions (e.g. $1.2m)

autonumeric_abbr_thousands._description: The suffix to show after an abbreviated value in the thousands (e.g. $1.2k)
